msContents.summary: This manuscript contains the commentary of Nārāyaṇa. The beginning is in Sanskrit, but the rest of the commentary is in Malayalam.

msItem.title: Amarakoṣapañcikā
msItem.author: Nārāyaṇa

filiation.p: British Library Mackenzie VII. 3, Adyar Library 21. Q. 7. (Krishnamacharya 1947: : 368), Trivandrum Palace Library 2053–2057 (Mahadeva Śāstrī 1938: 3176–3181), BnF Sancrit 620, IFP RE 33660, EAP 729/1/1/43.

msItem.incipit:
kleśādayo yan na parāmṛśanti yo vā bibharttiś ca śa
śabdam ekaḥ purātanānāḥ gurave gurūṇāṃ tasmai namo nāgavibhūṣaṇāya ||

text.p:
gurutvā
d eva tanāmnoktatvāt_ yasyeti vāyudaivatasya yakārasyādau nirddeśaśīghra
samāptyartthaḥ yasya jñeti bhūmigaṇasya gurutrayātmakasya cādau nirdeśaṃ sthe
yādisaddhyarthaḥ jñānadayāsindhor iti viśeṣadvayaphaladvayavivakṣayā
ayam artthaḥ mokṣe dhī jñānam anyatra vijñānaḥ śilpaśāstrayor iti vakṣya
ti vararuciś ca pravṛttam apavarggāya jñānam ity ucyate budhaiḥ vijñā
m anyacśāstreṣu kalāsu ca pariśramaḥ iti jñānasindhutvād amṛtāya sevyatāṃ
dayāsindhutvāc ca śriyai bhuktaye sevyatām iti sindhusāmyam āha || agādhasya
avāṅmanasagocarasya anyatrātalasparśasya anaghā guṇāḥ smaraṇakīrttanādibhir a
ghanirodhinaḥ anyatrasnānādibhiḥ akṣayaḥ nāśarahitaḥ anyatra viṣṇo kṣayaḥ
vāsadeśaḥ tathā ca vakṣyati nilayāpacayau kṣayāv iti dhīrāḥ gaṃbhirāḥ guṇāḥ atha
vā dhiyaṃ prayacśatīti dhīrāḥ rā dāne āto nupasargge kaḥ buddhidā ity artthaḥ athavā dhī
rā vidvāṃsaḥ bhavat_bhis sevyatām iti śriyai amṛtāya ca jñānaiś caryyādibhiḥ vṛddhaṃ sindhu
m āśrityam evāśriyam amṛtatvañ cāpnuvat_ ēvam asau grandham amṛtārttha sevyatām iti bhu
ktaye muktaye cety artthaḥ ēvaṃbhūtāt_ guror llabdhatvād itīdam api śāstram atigāḍhaṃ nānā
duḥkharahitañ ca tasmād dhīrair gguṇajñānakuśalair idaṃ śāstram ānāryya śri
yai ca sevyatām ity artthaḥ
